    • 方法详细资料

      • addParamConverter

        static <T> void addParamConverter(@NonNull
                                  java.lang.Class<T> clazz,
                                  ParamConverter<T> converter)
        add parameter converter for specific class
        类型参数:
        T - class template
        参数:
        clazz - class to add
        converter - converter with clazz

      • getParamConverter

        static <T> ParamConverter<T> getParamConverter(@NonNull
                                               java.lang.Class<?> clazz)
        get parameter converter for specific class
        类型参数:
        T - class template
        参数:
        clazz - specific class
        返回:
        equivalent converter

      • addParamConverter

        static <T> void addParamConverter(@NonNull
                                  java.lang.Class<T> clazz)
        add default parameter class WrapperObjectParamConverter with specific class\
        类型参数:
        T - class template
        参数:
        clazz - specific class

      • setParam

        void setParam(android.os.Bundle bundle)
        fill current parameter map with Bundle
        参数:
        bundle - source parameters

      • setParam

        void setParam(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> params)
        fill current parameter map with Map<?, ?>
        参数:
        params - source parameters

      • toURL

        java.lang.String toURL()
                throws EjuParamException
        turn current parameter map to url represented by String
        返回:
        map string representation
        抛出:
        EjuParamException - error in turn

      • toBundle

        android.os.Bundle toBundle()
        turn current parameter map to Bundle representation
        返回:
        map bundle representation

      • fromUrl

        android.os.Bundle fromUrl(java.lang.String url)
        decode the given url to Bundle representation
        参数:
        url - url to decode
        返回:
        url Bundle representation
